define: Use this API to create Manual Selection Product Ads

error_list.name: ads.item.adult_item
error_list.description: Item is an adult item cannot have this campaign setting.

error_list.name: ads.campaign.error_date_setting
error_list.description: The start/end date of campaign should be larger or equal to today. End date to be empty for unlimited duration.

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: ads.api.http_method_not_allowed
error_list.description: Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.

error_list.name: ads.campaign.invalid_start_date
error_list.description: The start date has to be today for no end date (unlimited duration).

error_list.name: ads.keyword.price_too_high
error_list.description: Price of Keyword is too high.

error_list.name: ads.keyword.price_too_low
error_list.description: Price of Keyword is too low.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.campaign_level
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_partner_api
error_list.description: Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_shop_api
error_list.description: Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_api
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

A random string used to prevent duplicate ads. If an ads is created successfully, subsequent request using the same reference id will fail

","name":"reference_id","sample":"asdf-1234-qwerty","type":"string","required":"True","key":"bCNjpby"},{"description":"

The budget set for the Auto Product Ads

","name":"budget","sample":"10.50","type":"float","required":"True","key":"sHTtTBc"},{"description":"

the start date per campaign. please kindly note that if you want to set unlimited date, you can just pass today's date as the start date

","name":"start_date","sample":"11-11-2023","type":"string","required":"True","key":"WWGcMNH"},{"description":"

the end date of each campaign. please kindly note that if you want to set an unlimited campaign, you can keep empty for the end date field

","name":"end_date","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WzyDJrT"},{"description":"

auto, manual

","name":"bidding_method","sample":"auto","type":"string","required":"True","key":"HStXfMz"},{"description":"

Product ID

","name":"item_id","sample":"111222","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"XmEcrRF"},{"description":"

the ROAS target for each campaign with auto bidding. If 0, GMV Max / ROI feature is not enabled

","name":"roas_target","sample":"1.20","type":"float","required":"False","key":"kwjaKQk"},{"description":"

selected keywords, required for manual bidding mode

","name":"selected_keywords","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"WBXMfKB","children":[{"description":"

bid keyword for each campaign

","name":"keyword","sample":"apple","type":"string","required":"True","key":"tpTnQJJ"},{"description":"

exact, broad

","name":"match_type","sample":"exact","type":"string","required":"True","key":"EpwTMEw"},{"description":"

the bid price of keyword

","name":"bid_price_per_click","sample":"11.20","type":"float","required":"True","key":"JAAXre"}]},{"description":"

the location settings for manual bidding method

","name":"discovery_ads_locations","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"eePyWaC","children":[{"description":"

daily_discover, you_may_also_like

","name":"location","sample":"daily_discover","type":"string","required":"True","key":"xbWhRDE"},{"description":"

bid price of the location

","name":"bid_price","sample":"10.50","type":"float","required":"True","key":"HEGYfxn"}]},{"description":"

Enhanced CPC functionality toggle

","name":"enhanced_cpc","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"FzeAppj"},{"description":"

Whether to use default or set on/off Smart Creative for this ad. Supported Values: \"\", \"default\", \"on\", \"off\". Empty string treated as default.

","name":"smart_creative_setting","sample":"default","type":"string","required":"False","key":"GRdxbJe"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Error code, empty when no error returned

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kCNJaT"},{"description":"

error description

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jQDFMje"},{"description":"

If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NQbhnk"},{"description":"

request id is unique for each request

","name":"request_id","sample":"6f235f4a343e4feb8a9ed74c439f6663","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ebfErh"},{"description":"

response body

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"rrhktKH","children":[{"description":"

The unique identifier for a campaign

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WsBNfmw"}]}]}
